metadata.description: Name of the Cisco Firepower Connector
URL of the Cisco Firepower REST API

uiDefinition.description: Authentication type to connect to your API
uiDefinition.tooltip: Authentication type to connect to your API

info.title: Cisco Firepower Management Center REST API

post.description: Firepower Management Center REST API authentication tokens are valid for 30 minutes, and can be refreshed up to three times.
Firepower Management Center REST API authentication tokens are valid for 30 minutes, and can be refreshed up to three times.

delete.summary: Deletes the FQDN object associated with the specified ID
delete.description: Deletes the FQDN object associated with the specified ID

get.summary: Retrieves the FQDN object associated with the specified ID
get.description: Retrieves the FQDN object associated with the specified ID

put.summary: Modifies the FQDN object associated with the specified ID
put.description: Modifies the FQDN object associated with the specified ID

get.summary: Retrieves list of all FQDN objects
get.description: Retrieves list of all FQDN objects

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: To be used in conjunction with \"unusedOnly:true\" to search for unused objects and \"nameOrValue:{nameOrValue}\" to search for both name and value.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of first item to return.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description: If set to true, the GET response displays a list of objects with additional attributes.

ILinks.description: This defines the self referencing links for the given resource.

parent.description: Full resource URL path to reference the parent (if any) for this resource.

self.description: Full resource URL path to reference this particular resource.

MetadataUser.description: This object defines details about the user.

id.description: The unique UUID of the user

Readonly.description: Defines the read only conditions if the referenced resource is read only.

reason.description: Reason the resource is read only - SYSTEM (if it is system defined), RBAC (if user RBAC permissions make it read only) or DOMAIN (if resource is read only in current domain).

state.description: True if this resource us read only and false otherwise.

Metadata.description: Defines read only details about the object - whether it is system defined, last user who modified the object etc.

IOverride.description: Defines the override details for this object.

FQDNObject.description: A model representing FQDN Network object definition.

dnsResolution.description: DNS resolution: Resolve within IPv4 and IPv6, Resolve within IPv4 addresses only, Resolve within IPv6 addresses only

overridable.description: Boolean indicating whether object values can be overridden.

overrideTargetId.description: Unique identifier of domain or device when override assigned to child domain. Used as path parameter to GET override details for a specific object on a specific target (device or domain).

OverridePost.description: Defines the override details for this object.
